department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: PP for a Disk Harrow. Bids must be submitted by 14:00 on October 03th, 2023
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal for Agricultural Machinery

## Background

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for the provision of one (1) Disk Harrow in accordance with Annex A – Requirement dated 2023-08-13. This procurement is being managed by the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA).

## Essential Details

- **Reference Number:** WS4148065222-Doc4148077364
- **Publication Date:** September 5, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** October 3, 2023 (14:00 EST)
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 31, 2023
- **Contact Information:**
  - Raphael Lafontaine (SPAC/PSPC)
  - Phone: Not specified
  - Email: [raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Key Requirements

- The bidder must submit the required supporting documentation and bid submission by October 3rd, 2023, at 14:00 EST.
- All bids submitted after the specified deadline will be declared non-responsive.
- The requested delivery date for the Disk Harrow is March 31, 2023.

## Solicitation Details

- This procurement is being conducted under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
- The solicitation method is Competitive - Open bidding.
- The evaluation criteria for this procurement are based on price.
- As per the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), bidders from any province in Canada are eligible to participate.

## Documents and Attachments

The solicitation documents and other relevant information can be found on the Ariba Discovery website:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17363414?extsite=MTczNjM0MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Important Note

The bidders are advised to disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on the specified date and time. Failure to do so will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
